Title: etcd user credentials are stored in WAL logs in plaintext
Description: The etcd assumes that the on disk files are secure. The possible fixes have been provided, however, it is the responsibility of the etcd users to make sure that the etcd server WAL log files are secure.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.3.23, all versions starting from 3.4.0 before 3.4.10
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.3.23 before 3.4.0, all versions starting from 3.4.10
